verses.name: John 11:42
verses.text: And I knew that thou hearest me always: but because of the people which stand by I said it, that they may believe that thou hast sent me.

verses.name: John 11:43
verses.text: And when he thus had spoken, he cried with a loud voice, Lazarus, come forth.

verses.name: John 11:44
verses.text: And he that was dead came forth, bound hand and foot with graveclothes: and his face was bound about with a napkin. Jesus saith unto them, Loose him, and let him go.

verses.name: John 11:45
verses.text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary, and had seen the things which Jesus did, believed on him.
